name: WordPress Essential Blocks
author: PluginRox

sections.description:
Highly customizable SEO friendly Gutenberg blocks for WordPress.

Demo

Try Demo

    Username: wpeb
    Password: pluginrox

Available Blocks

  • InfoBlock – A highly customizable, SEO friendly Content Block to display importent data like Services, Features etc.
  • Button – A simple (Icon) Button with a lot of customizable features.
  • Background Layer – A Customizable Background Layer for blocks.
  • Contact Form 7 – Easy Embed Contact Form 7.

Available Template

  • InfoBlock 3 Column – Ready to use 3 InfoBox side by side wrapped into Default Column Block.
sections.installation: 1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
sections.faq:
What are the requirements to use Essential Blocks?

You only need to have the latest version of WordPress (Gutenberg !disabled) on your website.
sections.changelog:
v1.0.2

Features
* Added Background Layer block
* Added Contact Form 7 block
Bug Fixes
* Remove console warning for margin inputs
* Set button margin to auto
Refactoring
* Remove unused method
* Change testdomain placeholder.

v1.0.1

Features
* Improve CSS Customization
* Added Button block
Bug Fixes
* Some bug fix

v1.0.0

  • Initial release
